sentences.english: A working team from the Ministry of Civil Affairs will go to Xiangfan to direct the relief work.
sentences.chinese: 民政事務部的一個工作組將會去襄樊市指導救援工作。

sentences.english: They have permitted Xiangfan City to make preparations for the construction of the project.
sentences.chinese: 省交通廳已同意由襄樊市籌建該工程。
